Text.Name: LsPanda_Carve
Text.Desc: Statue of a divine panda. Can be used to revive or summon a divine panda.

Text.Name: BambooBed
Text.Desc: A cozy bamboo single bed that can provide you with a good night's sleep.

Text.Name: BambooLight
Text.Desc: A decorative light that shines at night to illuminate its surroundings.
